dataset_description.Name: Safety and Accuracy of Stereoelectroencephalography for Pediatric Patients with Prior Craniotomy
EthicsApprovals: Approval obtained from the Institutional Review Board at Washington University in St Louis

readme_content:
BIDS iEEG dataset for the SEEG electrode data used for analysis in the manuscript title "Safety and Accuracy of Stereoelectroencephalography for Pediatric Patients with Prior Craniotomy."
All coordinates are recorded in the individual native post-operative CT imaging space. There was no alignment to other imaging modalities or standardized atlases.

github_info.description: OpenNeuro dataset - Safety and Accuracy of Stereoelectroencephalography for Pediatric Patients with Prior Craniotomy
